meanings.definition: The act of riding a snowmobile.
meanings.sent1: Skimobiling is so much fun in the winter!
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of people skimobiling on the snowy trails.
meanings.sent3: The family decided to go skimobiling together for the first time.
meanings.sent4: The sound of skimobiling echoed through the quiet forest.
meanings.sent5: I'll never forget the thrill of skimobiling for the first time.

meanings.definition: A person who rides a snowmobile.
meanings.sent1: Look at that skilled skimobiling expert!
meanings.sent2: The skimobiling enthusiast showed us some cool tricks.
meanings.sent3: The friendly skimobiling guide led us on an adventure.
meanings.sent4: She zoomed past us like a professional skimobiling racer.
meanings.sent5: The champion skimobiling athlete inspired many young riders.
